column4: can anyone help me with my sound problem?all i hear is the looped startup ubuntu sound
all i can do is to mute the channels of my soundcard
i already took a look in some forums and on the alsa page but can't find anything
don't know what to do anymore. can't believe that i won't have no sound on linux
it's an terratec dmx 6 fire (on alsa page it sais it is supported)
and i already hat tested it with suse 9.2 and it worked
since i reinstalled ubuntus actual rc it doesn' work anymore
does lspci see the thing, does alsamixer see the thing?
some sound cards were broken on one kernel some time ago
did you try maxing out all volume levels?
